explains: n. 友善，善意；（公司的）信誉
wordGroup: goodwill ambassador 亲善大使，友好大使

sentences.en: I invited them to dinner, a gesture of goodwill.
sentences.cn: 我邀请他们来吃饭以示友好。

sentences.en: We do not want to lose the goodwill built up over 175 years.
sentences.cn: 我们不想失去用175年建立起来的商业信誉。

sentences.en: This gesture of goodwill did little to improve the tense atmosphere at the talks.
sentences.cn: 这一友好姿态对改善谈判的紧张气氛几乎没起什么作用。
